HAPV3.SA.summary: Hapvida ParticipaÃ§Ãµes e Investimentos S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the healthcare sector in Brazil. The company offers health and dental insurance plans. It also provides medical and paramedical, laboratory, diagnostic, imaging, and ultrasound services, as well as organizes courses, lectures, seminars, and other events. In addition, the company engages in the administration, advisory, and implementation of operation systems for private health care plans in the dental segment; management, advisory, implementation, and sale of individual, family, and collective health care systems and plans; and the reimbursement of medical, dental, hospital, and outpatient expenses to its beneficiaries. Further, it provides medical and hospital services in the area of radiology and diagnostic imaging, and nuclear medicine, as well as professional development training, advisory, and consultancy services; and outpatient medical care services. The company operates a network of 39 hospitals, 42 emergency units, 185 clinics, and 179 diagnostic and laboratories centers. Hapvida ParticipaÃ§Ãµes e Investimentos S.A. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Fortaleza, Brazil.
